articles.content: SINGAPORE - About 2,500 travellers have arrived in Singapore via reciprocal green lanes from June 8 to Dec 25 last year, with two among them testing positive for Covid-19, Health Minister Gan Kim Yon… [+2553 chars]

articles.title: Karnataka had 7 lineages of SARS-Cov-2 until May - The New Indian Express
articles.description: Study provides proof for multiple introductions of virus into state
articles.content: BENGALURU: A study that traced the spread of Covid-19 in Karnataka between March 8 and May 21 found 91 genomes of SARS-CoV-2 clustered into seven lineages. A paper, ‘Genomic epidemiology reveals mult… [+2625 chars]

articles.title: Oxford vaccine rolls out as UK starts lockdown - Chinadaily USA
articles.description: The United Kingdom has begun rolling out a COVID-19 vaccination from Oxford University and pharmaceutical company AstraZeneca, amid rising levels of infection that have forced a third nationwide lockdown.
